Description: BASIC QUALIFICATIONS- Work a flexible schedule/shift/work area, including weekends, nights, and/or holidays- Language – Fluent Arabic and English is essential.- Completed a 4 year college degree.- Military exemption\ completion\ 3 years postpone.- 2 years’ experience within a customer service environment in Multinational call center.- PC Skills: Experience working with Operating systems (Windows) and using Office Suites( Microsoft Word, Outlook)- Technical Skills: Basic working knowledge of spreadsheet software such as Excel and the ability to use communication and collaboration tools with easePREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS- Demonstrate appropriate sense of urgency and adaptability in response to changing business needs- Demonstrates effective communication, composure, and professional attitude- Experience with serving Customers from a work from home environmentJob Details
